resources.string: My name is Seppe Clottemans. I am 20 years old and study Multimedia And Communication Technology at the Erasmus University College in Brussels. This is the very first Android project I ever made I hope you enjoy the application.
This checkbox is just for fun. Press it if you like the application.

We are very sorry but this app only works with an accelerometer in your device, and it seems like your device does not have one. We are trying to find a solution for this in future versions of the app, but until then you will not be able to use this app.
